introduction_text:
Welcome back to EWCMUN. In this year’s MUN, you, fellow delegates, will determine the future of our nations. Your collaboration and teamwork will instill the proper values in the different committees that interest you best. Remember MUN isn’t just about proving your point, it is about working together to acknowledge our past mistakes and reflect on them in our present, all to build a better future.


Venue: Eastwood College Kafarshima

Date: Feb 8,9 2025

Payment(paid by the deadline of registration): $25 cash (to cover baseline expenses of operating the school, awards, printing costs, and cafeteria services) at the accounting office(at Eastwood College Kfarshima) or by Money transfer through OMT transaction to the number: 71/ 011 741 (Eastwood official OMT account)

Contact information: ewc.mun2023@gmail.com
name: delegate-application
title: Delegate Application
